story:
Short Summary

Hi! We’re the Southern Coalition for Social Justice, a nonprofit, community-driven organization based in Durham, North Carolina that focuses on voting rights and other pressing civil rights issues. We are dedicated to protecting the rights of all eligible North Carolina voters against the state's new, oppressive "monster voter law."  We've created a mobile data collection app that will give volunteers an effective tool to report instances of voter suppression at NC polling places on Election Day. Not only will this information help our organization respond immediately to resolve voters' problems, documenting the negative effects of the new voter law will arm us with important data as we continue to we challenge the law in court. Just as important, this app provides our community partners with information that they've identified as being essential to their successful voting rights work.

What We Need & What You Get

$1,500 will be used to pay for the web service that hosts the mobile data that will be collected in North Carolina. This is just a part of a larger campaign to raise funds to pay also for community volunteer training sessions and related training materials, and for staff time to crunch the data we receive on Election Day in North Carolina and in other states in the Southeast. Your donation helps us get the app into the hands of the people who need it most. 

Get into the fight to defend voting rights in North Carolina. Help us work to make sure that every voter can cast a ballot and that every vote is counted!

story:
Stretch Goals

Let us talk a bit about stretch-goal style milestones for funding. We are now fully funded and the artists are already at work on the illustrations for the book — that's great! Stay tuned for updates showing off some of the sketches that have come in.

In the meantime, here's what happens if we pass select funding milestones:

At $3,000: Each artist gets a 20% raise on their pay rate in thanks for signing on with the project early. I also want to thank you in advance, contributors, in case we hit this threshold.

At $5,000: I write the sequel book for Odyssey, containing the complete game rules, a deeper look at how to play the game (and how to meddle with its components), plus a slew of new playset modes and mechanisms. This funding milestone helps pay for illustrations for that book, too.

If we draw near to the second milestone, I'll talk more about what this sequel contains and which perks get it. (Short version: The idea is that one could buy the two Odyssey books in any order and get the complete game, plus distinct playsets, mechanisms, and procedural content.) For now, one milestone at a time. 

Onward!

Intro

Odyssey is a tabletop game about characters on journeys. It's about how journeys change us and how the person who departs on a journey can differ from the one who arrives at the destination. As you play, your characters change. As they change, stories emerge. So Odyssey is a game about stories, too, set in our world, in outer space, in fantasy realms — anywhere you can imagine.

About the Game

Odyssey is a complete, introductory, story-driven game for 3-6 players that yields complete tales in about 2-3 hours. 

In Odyssey, characters are defined by six characteristics written in plain language, usually combining two traits — an adjective and a noun. For example, a character might be both a Nefarious Treasure-Hunter and a Reckless Archaeologist. As the character confronts challenges along their journey, they gain and lose individual traits as a result of their experiences, so that archaeologist might stop being reckless or give up treasure-hunting (at least for a while).

This process of changing characters during play provokes dramatic questions. How was the character changed? Why did he or she change in this way? What does it mean for them as people? How does it affect the player's portrayal of the character?

Over the past two years, I developed Odyssey to be playable quickly, in any fictional setting, without a game master, so that students at the creative-writing camp where I teach could play the game within the imaginary worlds they built together. The game helps players think about characters as multitudinous beings, as complex and faceted persons that change over time. 

It's also meant to be playable in a wide variety of worlds and styles without any experience necessary from other story or roleplaying games. The Odyssey beta edition ships with seven modes of play, including:

"Sojourn," in which characters journey across a fantastical desert in search of a fabled city of the wise.

"Hyperfleet" challenges each player to write and portray an ensemble of shared characters traveling across the cosmos in a ragged fleet of starships, fleeing from an alien invasion.

"Spirits of the Sea" offers an adventurous voyage across haunted seas with the players' characters as the crew of the sailing ship, August Lion.

"Passage of Years" follows a handful of characters throughout their lives, from childhood through old age, by looking at the moments when those characters reenter each other's lives over the years.

A catalog of optional game mechanisms makes it easy to tinker with and build your own modes of play, too.

About the Launch Edition Perks

As you might guess once you see the beta edition, the launch edition of Odyssey will be a 6-inch x 9-inch black-and-white softcover book or PDF.

To clarify the DriveThruRPG physical-copy discount: You'll get an email enabling you to buy a copy of the printed book at a steep discount (estimated cost is about US$5) and you'll also pay shipping. Please do check to make sure that you can order and receive shipments from DriveThruRPG before selecting the applicable perks. 

Journey

Three years ago, I sat down at my kitchen table and started sketching out notions for the game that would become Odyssey. Over the years, it transmuted into various interstitial forms — some of them funny, some of them overly complicated — but actual play kept guiding me toward something simpler and simpler. Years of play, like x-rays, revealed the bones of a fun, simple game within my original design.

So I made that simple game the heart of Odyssey and made everything else into a customizable, expandable, and optional toolbox.

Then I played the game with different options over a span of two years to see how everything held up in actual play. We've played Odyssey in homes, at conventions, and at writing camp — sometimes with rooms of 30+ players participating at once. It's been a terrific experience.

Now it's time for the final stress test. Now it's time for the game to meet a new audience. Now it's time to turn Odyssey's rules into a book.

See for yourself. Contribute to this campaign and you'll get the complete beta-edition rules of the game as a PDF file within a few days. Play the game, let me know what you think of it, and maybe impact the course of its design and production.

And Change

Your money changes Odyssey from a vision to a reality. Beyond beta testing the game, this campaign builds up an art budget for the final rulebook. Funds raised pay each artist for their illustrations and me for my writing & design time. A team of talents has already stepped up to illustrate this book, provided the funding comes through. This team includes terrific artists (though some portfolios may be NSFW):

  • Leah Huete has dedicated her powers to good (or at least to art) for almost a decade, as a photographer and illustrator, and has provided words, photos, and illustrations to various RPG projects including Technoir, Strange Tales of the Century, various Posthuman Studios products, One Shot, and Eternal Lies for Trail of Cthulhu. Leah lives with her three boys, and loves every cat. See some of her work.
  • David Lewis Johnson, a freelance illustrator, concept artist, painter, and tabletop gamer from Missoula, Montana. His finest stupid human trick is drawing while walking. See some of his work. 
  • Phil Reeves works in print and graphic design but focuses his free time on drawing and gaming. Influenced by Frazetta, Lovecraft and Critchlow, with classical training in paint and pencil, he has since moved into exclusively digital pieces. The importance of a visual narrative is a central feature of his work, combined with a predominate use of contrasting light.
  • Steven Sanders, a comic and concept artist living in Kansas City, MO. Among other clients, he's worked for Marvel (Infinity:The Hunt, Wolverine and the X-Men) and recently Kickstarted Symbiosis, an open-source world-building art book. See some of his work.

These artists aim to bring Odyssey to life with rich, vivid illustrations for each playset or "mode" of the game. A few, like Phil Reeves, have already begun work to give you a sense of the look they're creating for the game. Here's a glimpse at Reeves's progress on the illustration for the "Lost Continent" playset:


I can't wait to see what else they have in store for us!

The finished version of Odyssey will be about 8–16 pages longer than the beta edition, including additional advice and clarifications based on the feedback I get from advanced readers. That might even call for additional art!

With enough contributions — with help from these wonderful artists and that wonderful you — I can produce the finished edition of Odyssey for publication and release at DriveThruRPG as a PDF file and POD book. Extra funds make it possible for me to spend time designing additional games and books, such as an Odyssey sequel book featuring new mechanisms and modes of play. With enough money, I can increase the pay rate of the artists on this book, too.

If we don't raise sufficient funds, fewer illustrations get commissioned, based on what I can afford to pay. 

The look of Odyssey's first (or "launch") edition depends on you.

About Me

I'm Will Hindmarch, a freelance writer and designer. My recent credits include fiction or essays in The Thackery T. Lambshead Cabinet of Curiosities and Wonderbook. I've worked, either on staff or as a freelancer, with Atlas Games, White Wolf Publishing, Fantasy Flight Games, and Green Ronin Publishing. I co-founded Gameplaywright Press with Jeff Tidball and am an advisor and designer for Protagonist Labs's forthcoming online story game, Storium. I've been a full-time professional in the game sector for more than a decade. 

Most of my career has been spent making other people's games. To produce my own, I need help scraping together funds for art budgets, for design time, for production time. I've spent a lot of time on the game and the book already. Now I need help to pay myself and the artists who can make Odyssey as handsome as I've imagined it could be.

Spread the Word

It's a true fact that not everyone who wants to help always can, so I appreciate what you can do to get the word out about this campaign even if you cannot contribute to its funding. The more eyes that see this page, the more imaginations that get to play Odyssey during this beta, the better the game stands to be. Thank you for your time and attention.

story:
Last summer dozens of undocumented parents, workers and students set off on a bus tour across the southern part of the country on the 'No Papers No Fear Ride for Justice.'  The Undocubus traveled from Arizona to the Democratic National Convention (DNC) in Charlotte, North Carolina to challenge anti-immigrant laws and peel away the fear that draconian immigration laws have imbedded in our community.  

Since returning home, riders and participating organizations have continued organizing and fighting deportations in our communities.  We have watched, as have many, the debate on how to reform our immigration system.  We have been hopeful.  But we have also grown weary of the political games both Republicans and Democrats play with our lives.  And we will not overlook the role and responsibility President Obama with respect to his Administration's policies and record breaking deportations.  We ask, what will come first: 2 million people deported or inclusive immigration reform?  For this reason, we've decided to ride again.  

Our goal is to raise $18,000 to jump start our journey.  

The funds will go towards the costs of the bus tour - materials, food, transportation, etc.  But before we hit the road again, we've got to get our bus running.  Earlier this year 'Priscila the Undocubus' was vandalized and needs interior and mechanical work done.  Community members, mechanics, carpenters, artists have all committed to help.  It was community support that made the tour successful the first time, it will be community that makes sure the Undocubus will be a vehicle for justice once again.  That community includes you.

story:
Short Summary

This is my project to create a first person shooter in Virtual Reality. Much like the 'Time Crisis' and "House of the Dead' saga you will control the shooting but you will now also control the head camera movements to look around. Also using motion sensor controllers to play the game the player will be able to wield duel guns in game that function separately to one another. 

  • I am a university student of Media Production
  • I am passionate about my work and always think big
  • This idea is possible and fairly simple to make
  • I am always looking to create new ideas that can change a bigger picture

 What Gets Made

I will create one level playable based in a western environment in which the player is to shoot random pop up targets in a full 360 scene. The aim of this is to achieve a high score before the time limit ends. Based on its success an additional level may be created in my time frame of project development.
As for my game being different one thing 'Time Crisis' & "House of the Dead' also had was there own device in which to play the game, i will not be going to that extent but i will be creating a small fold away game area to which you play from - as to avoid and breakages and to contain the player as they are static in game (added realism) 

What I Need & What You Get

This where your money will go and how it will help:

  • I am only asking for £600.
  • This is because the software I intend to use is commercially free and the money will buy the needed hardware.
  • £200 of the money will purchase me the 'Razer Hydra' motion sensor controllers for testing and playing the game
  • £300 of the money will buy a suitable computer on which I can create the game and run it 
  • £150 of the money will go on designing and building and small fold up gaming area as to contain the player when wearing the headset
  • £50 of the money will be for contingency in case of any problems throughout my project
  • As for the Oculus Headset, my University has very kindly got behind my idea and purchased two sets - because of this I will also be donating the motion controllers to the University Media department as thanks after my project (for future student use in an ever growing gaming medium)
  • If i do not reach my goal the money raised so far will still go towards either of the above factors, I am determined to create this game

 What Do You Get From My Project

As I mentioned I will be donating the controllers to my University afterwards, but the computer you ask? My University does not require any addition computers and the computer I need is not of the specifications my University has. As this is the case i will put the computer to good use after the project to carry on developing more gaming content for this project, this means - 
  • More Levels
  • More environments to play in
  • A varied selection of game weapons
  • New challenges
  • Harder and easier levels for all players
  • And New games all together!
As for you contribution you will receive a person thank you for every donation made and there are several different perks available from your donations.
These range from early release of the completed game, a poster and being added to the credits and contributors list of the game.

My Aim And It's Impact

This virtual reality game is not like most others, my aim is to take the player out of the gaming comfort zone - THE CHAIR! I want to show the world that with existing technologies already available it is not hard to create simple yet attractive virtual reality games people can enjoy without playing from a chair. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cant contribute but like the idea please share this project with people you know. I need as much help as I can get. Post my idea on social networks, talk about the project through word of mouth, even send my project page in a snapchat to people! Every little bit you do to spread the word help me massively.

story:
Blocked

The minimum funding goal in here is $500, but I only need $100.

Short Summary

Blocked is an idie game inspired by Lemmings and Minecraft. It's pretty early in development right now, but I have a lot of plans for it. This is my first real game and it would be incredible to get this on Steam Greenlight.

I have started programming in java about 1 year ago to make mods for Minecraft. After about a month I wanted more and started learning how to create my own games. I have made 2 games before this. One was a simple yet slightly changed Pong game and the second was something a bit like Mario.

If I get 100 dollars for this project I can get my game onto Steam greenlight and it would greatly help me to get an audience for my game.

What I Need & What You Get

To get on Steam Greenlight I will have to pay 100 dollars. The full amount will be donated to Child's play, so if you support me you will indirectly support a charity.

The game will be a bit like Lemmings. There is an entrance where the people will come from and there will be an exit on the other side of the level. The Minecraft part of this game is that the game is made out of blocks.

The goal in the game is to help the people to get to the exit. You can do this by placing blocks and fixing the road for them, but also by giving some of them certain perks.

You can find some pictures from some harder and an outside level the gallery.

The Impact

I have asked several people what they think about this game and all of them think that this has great potential. 

One important thing to note is that the 100 dollars will not only be donated to Childs play and help me to get this game on Steam Greenlight, but it will give me the chance to add an unlimited amount of games to it. This way you will not only help me for this one game, but also for later and possibly better games I make.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can really help me get this project started by sharing it on Twitter, Facebook or just by telling people in person.

Also if you have any suggestions for this game I would be happy to add them.
story_txt:
Blocked
The minimum funding goal in here is $500, but I only need $100.
Short Summary
Blocked is an idie game inspired by Lemmings and Minecraft. It's pretty early in development right now, but I have a lot of plans for it. This is my first real game and it would be incredible to get this on Steam Greenlight.
I have started programming in java about 1 year ago to make mods for Minecraft. After about a month I wanted more and started learning how to create my own games. I have made 2 games before this. One was a simple yet slightly changed Pong game and the second was something a bit like Mario.
If I get 100 dollars for this project I can get my game onto Steam greenlight and it would greatly help me to get an audience for my game.


What I Need & What You Get
To get on Steam Greenlight I will have to pay 100 dollars. The full amount will be donated to Child's play, so if you support me you will indirectly support a charity.
The game will be a bit like Lemmings. There is an entrance where the people will come from and there will be an exit on the other side of the level. The Minecraft part of this game is that the game is made out of blocks.
The goal in the game is to help the people to get to the exit. You can do this by placing blocks and fixing the road for them, but also by giving some of them certain perks.
You can find some pictures from some harder and an outside level the gallery.


The Impact
I have asked several people what they think about this game and all of them think that this has great potential. 
One important thing to note is that the 100 dollars will not only be donated to Childs play and help me to get this game on Steam Greenlight, but it will give me the chance to add an unlimited amount of games to it. This way you will not only help me for this one game, but also for later and possibly better games I make.


Other Ways You Can Help
You can really help me get this project started by sharing it on Twitter, Facebook or just by telling people in person.
Also if you have any suggestions for this game I would be happy to add them.

story:
Edmonton Warriors Under 16s have the opportunity to travel to Europe to play friendly games against teams such as Partizan and Red Star Belgrade.

At home they have won back to back league championships, 4 cup tournaments in two years and have qualified for the last three Provincial Championships winning Bronze in March 2013.

With their Coach former professional soccer player Nikki Vignjevic this team embodies the future of soccer, for Edmonton, for Alberta and perhaps for some guys Canada.

The team is comprised of players from many countries, included are Poland, Northern Ireland, Scotland, Columbia, Hungary, India, South Korea, Grenada and Tanzania. Many different cultures who all call Canada home and share the same dream and ambition.

In the past the teams from Belgrade have been impressed with the visiting Canadian athletes and, one more than one occasion asked for a player to return with a view to perhaps gaining a professional contract for a major European club.

We are raising funds for airfares, accommodation and meals for a ten day trip.

To make it these kids needs, skill, devotion a little bit of luck....... and your help please give what you can. Every $5 gets them a little closer to this once in a lifetime opportunity

story:
In JACANA CHESS the uncertainty of not knowing what the next card your opponent  will draw . . . Creates an unknown element of surprise!

Jacana Chess will be a Web Based interactive game were two opponents can play against each other. It uses the same principles of Chess with the exception of the specially designed playing cards dictate the moves of the chess pieces. Jacana Chess incorporates an element of surprise to the strategic planning by each opponent in the use of 104 uniquely designed cards, 52 cards per opponent. By not knowing the value of the card(s), the piece to be moved and the following of a few additional rules to the original game, each opponent now has as much an opportunity to win the game as the most professional players of chess! Thus the uniqueness provides the elements of an original conflict that have to be overcome by each player as a card is turned over and then played according to its face value. All the artwork for the game has been done, Playing board, Cards (Black & White), Chess Pieces, Instructions, Chess Moves, etc. When you login you can play the game 3 times for Free to continue to play a person buys a Subscription to the game ($5 for 1 Year).

The subscription will provide unlimited play, the ability to save the points you build up to get to higher levels, chat with your opponent, ability to pause the game, 6 Game Rankings by point levels accumulated, bonus card offerings, personalized custom decks when reaching highest level, and more. The game has the ability to teach a player who has never played chess before to learn how. It's EASY, FAST, and FUN! I'm at the point were Intelligent Software Solutions Inc. of Raleigh, N.C. has quoted the programing and marketing to complete this project in 10 Weeks for $15,250. The format of the game will be programed so it can be reached by phones, tablets, laptops, desk tops, T.V.s, etc. Intelligent Software estimates once the game is out on the market it should be able to draw a minimum of 10,000 downloads in it's first month to month and a half. There future Versions of the game such as: Jacana Strategy Chess, Partners Chess and Solitaire Chess. There also well be a "Slot" machine Version in the makings.

I am a single entity in Jacana Chess without the funds and that is why I'm seeking funding for this game.
Risks and Challenges:

I have worked with Intelligent Software Solutions Inc. (Tizbi Inc.) in the past on a Free game that a friend of mine created called "Shoot The Ghost". It can be found on Google Play and Amazon. By listening to Tizbi's advice the game has done very well in only one year and so far has received over 200 5 star reviews! I alone created all of the graphics for that game and trust the advice of Intelligent Software Inc. (They Produce What They Say . . . When They Say)

story:
The Bayou, that mysterious place. Mystical and recondite, we find beauty and danger alike.

It is the territory where two of the most charismatic known races, Forest Elves and Lizardmen, cohabite.

Now, both lineages will dispute the control of their domains… in a Football game!

Strength vs. skill… Who will make it to the top?

 

Who is Star Player Miniatures?

Star Player Miniatures is a small and young company composed by four Fantasy Football fanatics and friends.
Playing FF for a decade, we know what coaches want. Our intention is to produce our "dream miniatures" to play with.
We have been deeply involved with the Fantasy Football community. We run the largest tournament in Spain, Reva Bowl, for 8 years, and now we go one step further with a more ambicious project such as Star Player Miniatures. 
We work with the best sculptors and the best printers to get top quality miniatures.


The Campaign:

Now it´s time for lizardmen, our third team. After dwarves and forest elves, we proudly introduce you our (we think) top team up to date. 
Cold Blooded Warriors will be cast in metal and have been sculpted digitally.
Here you can see what you will get if you take one of these lizards home ;-) 
Interactive 3D Big Lizard
There are mainly three kinds of miniatures: the big lizards, small lizards and the lizard beast.
The big lizards, as strong creatures, will be a bit larger than 30 mm. On the other hand, the small lizards, are small, fast and scary creatures, and will be about 25 mm. The lizard beast... well, no need to explain ;-)
Also, as it is our first campaign, we want to thank you with a great deal. Since the forest elves were self financed, no campaign was made. Now and here you have the chance to get them at a superb price. Don´t miss this oportunity!


The teams:

First of all, the lizardmen team, one by one.




Sculpted by David Fernandez Barruz.


And now the elf team. Here is the family picture. We will update the gallery with individual pictures of each miniature.

Sculpted by Sergi Torras.

The perks:





Stretch Goals:




And more to come...

Final details:

Expected delivery time is end of April 2016. Nevertheless, we are working to shorten timing.
If you only backed elf miniatures, your miniatures will be sent right after the campaign ends and we get back your pledge manager. Anyway, we are working to have both teams finished as soon as possible (we will keep you up to date).
If you have reached here, we hope you liked our miniatures and hope to meet you on a Fantasy Football field.
Thank you!

story:
There's still time to be involved and get the exclusive prints!   Just contribute via the button below (list of perks are to the right)   The cut off for contributing is wednesay June 26th.

 

What we have so far thanks to your epic contributions!   

A sewing Machine is also on the way!  As well as an external power supply  and some more props!  Hoping we can reach or exceed our goal for the lens and another light in the next day!!!  *fingers crosses*   

 

Sexy Princesss Peach?  Go on... What's this about?

So I have started to put together something a little different than my usual cosplay or costumes.   A sexy version of the princess who's always in another castle, Mario's Princess Peach. This will be a Mario Lover's dream of both photos and a series of youtube videos to be posted on my channel called Poems With Princess Peach. I know you guys will love this!  

Liz Katz

To give you a bit of background on myself I am a "fun sized" lil firecracker and professional eccentric.  I come from a state of mind. Half nerd on my father's side and half mystical creature on my mother's.  An actress, model, writer, and artist by day.   A gamer, comic enthusiast, and cosplayer come night.

What We Need & What You Get

 I still need some more pieces to put this together.  The total for the remainder of the costume, themed background, Mario World props,  + new lighting (the lights I will be able to use again and again on future projects!!!  renting lights is expensive in itself!)   

UPDATED GOALS WHAT WE NEED +

I need a sewing machine and supplies of my own to be able to create this and additional cosplays. (I do not have one!)  I also need a new camera lense, and an external outdoor power supply for lights so I can light outdoor shoots professionally!   

 

For contributing

ALL IMAGE PRINTS ARE EXCLUSIVE TO THIS FUNDRAISER AND WON'T BE AVAILABLE ANYWHERE ELSE AT ANYTIME

$10 you will get a thank you email from me >^.^<  

$15 you will get a signed 4x6 Sexy Princess Peach photo

$25 You will get the entire set of signed Sexy Princess Peach photos

$50 You will get a personalized, signed Full Size Sexy Princess Peach Poster Exclusive to this Campaign!  

$75 You will get a the entire signed 4 X 6 Princess Peach Photo Set, A personalized signed exclusive Poster, and A Public shoutout on my  Facebook Page and Twitter Page.

$100  You will get the entire set of signed Sexy Princess Peach Posters + the 4 x 6 prints + shoutout on my Facebook Page and Twitter Page

$150  You will get the entire set of signed Sexy Princess Peach Posters + the 4 x 6 prints + a shout out thank you video on my youtube page for you!

$250  You get a credit for your contribution with a link to you or your company's site on the text of the images whenever and wherever they are posted  reposted with my consent.  You will also get the entire set of signed Sexy Princess Peach Posters + the 4 x 6 prints 

$500 You get a 15 minute skype conversation with me.  We can talk about almost anything you'd like (conversation must be kept appropriate)   You will also get a credit for your cotribution with a link, the entire set of  the exclusive signed Sexy Princess Peach Posters + the 4 x 6 prints

 

$2200 The Ultimate Package For Companies!!!

  I will work with your company on an ad campaign for you!  I will set Photoshoots with me and your product, I will create video endorsements, + You get your logo on all digital images from these shoots.  You will also get a credit for your contribution with a link, the entire set of the exclusive signed Sexy Princess Peach Posters + prints

Spread the word!!!!   If you have any mario themed decor you would like to cotnribute to this, please let me know!!!  

 

If we go beyond my goal, I'll post Updates on Extra Bonuses, reqards, and content!!! >^.^<   Keep being Epic!!!!   

UPDATE 1

WE REACHED $650 Thank you all so much!!!!  I will also be able to buy new shipping tubes that can stand up to the beatings from USPS for my posters at my store!   (darn usps!)

UPDATE 2 

We reached our $1500 Goal!!!   This means I can get a sewing machine and supplies on top of the costumes and props also everyone will get an additional photo as a perk ($15+ donations)

Update 3

WE REACHED OUR $2000 Goal!!!!     That means I can get the external power supply for lights and do more professional outdoor and location shoots!!!   + everyone ($50 + Donations) gets the signed Mario Poster!!!

NEW Goals!

$4400 

I can get a kick arse camera lense for this shoot and all future photoshoots!!! Canon EF 70-200mm f/2.8L  lens cost is $2200

Perks I will cosplay as Mario, Luigi, Yoshi and Princess Peach all as a set!   You get the a signed image from every character! (all $25+ donations)  (all 50+ donations gets posters!)

 FAQs

International Shipping

Due to shipping fees I can only ship to the U.S. For The Price Listed On Perks.  For International Shipping please Uses The USPS Calculator For Shipping Rates + Fees to Your Address From U.S. Zip Code 90016 and add that to Your Donation to Recieve The Mailed Perks.  

What if I forgot to add international shipping?
After the project is funded and we're ready to ship, we'll contact each contributor to confirm shipping details.  If you didn't add shipping or inderpaid when you contributed, you can add it then.  

Restrictions on Companies or Sites That You Will Promote

I WILL NOT PROMOTE OR ENDORSE ANY ADULT OR PORNOGRAPHIC SITES OR COMPANIES.

story:
Awards

Regional Gold Key awarded by the Scholastic Art and Writing competition.

Quotes

"Are you looking for a challenge, because this challenge is LOOKING FOR YOU"
- Noah Waltzer
"Did someone say music AND clicking?!" - Taylor Ian Snead
"Looking for a challenge, this game is for you." - Richard Rico Rubio
"Play Arrhythmia or be SQUARE!" - Patrick Burtchaell

About Arrhythmia

“Wouldn't it be cool to have game-play directly created by a song?”

This question interested me so much that during my Friday coding jam session I decided to try my hand at making such a game a reality. Thus Arrhythmia was born! 

Arrhythmia's gameplay is created by the community that plays it for the most part, with the only exception being the official beatmap pack that comes prebuilt into the game. I wanted it to be a self sustaining community. When new music comes out the community can turn the music into new beatmaps for other people to play with the in game beatmap editor. Beatmaps consist of a folder holding a music file, an album cover, and a beatmap file. All of these combine to create the gameplay within the game. After they are made they then can be uploaded to our servers to be downloaded by other Arrhythmia users using the in game downloader.

The point of Arrhtyhmia is to stay alive all the way through the song / beatmap you choose. You loose a bit of your health every time you collide with an object / projectile emitted from the cube in the center of the game screen.


Project Summary

Since Arrhythmia's conception we have been spending nearly all our free time on making it better. Arrhythmia is at a point were yes it is at least presentable, but we've come to IndieGoGo in the hopes that we can make it even more refined and better with your help! With your support, we want to buy the required tools and services to make Arrhythmia even better then it is already! In order to accomplish this, we're hoping to raise $2,500 with this IndieGoGo project.


What We Need & What You Get

The majority of the money raised will go towards the following...

  • Unity Pro Licence - $1500
  • A better server (to host beatmaps and user data) - $500
  • Fees associated with Steam / Humble Bundle - $100+

The rest will then be going towards paying for the rewards and IndieGoGo fees. However, that doesn't mean we have to stop there! If more money then the campaign's initial amount is raised we can offer each of you more bang for your buck. Such as...

  • Commission more musicians to make an original soundtrack for arrhythmia that would serve as a built in campaign mode for Arrhythmia.
  • Offer better / additional perks then those originally stated! Such as additional alpha codes for your friends!


Thanks! / Upgrade My Perk! ($1+)

  • Thanks anything helps! 
  • Use this perk if you want to up the tier of your original perk purchase.
  • Gives you access to digital downloads of Arrhythmia backgrounds.

Pre-Order the Game! ($6)

  • You get the finished game at a discounted price! Final game will cost $10.
  • Gives you access to digital downloads of Arrhythmia backgrounds.

Access to Development Builds! ($12)

  • Get access to development builds of game as well as the final game.
  • Gets you access to digital downloads of Arrhythmia backgrounds.
  • 4 Arrhythmia stickers of your choice.
  • A hand written thank you note.

Get Credit...in the credits! ($25)

  • Get access to development builds of game as well as the final game.
  • Gets you access to digital downloads of Arrhythmia backgrounds.
  • All 8 Arrhythmia stickers.
  • A hand written thank you note.
  • Put in game credits under Special Thanks!

Custom splash in the game! ($50)

  • Get access to development builds of game as well as the final game.
  • Gets you access to digital downloads of Arrhythmia backgrounds.
  • All 8 Arrhythmia stickers.
  • A hand written thank you note.
  • Put in game credits under Special Thanks!
  • Get to have a custom splash added into the game! *Restrictions* Splash must not include name or profanity.

Custom BeatMap in the game! ($75)

  • Get access to development builds of game as well as the final game.
  • Gets you access to digital downloads of Arrhythmia backgrounds.
  • All 8 Arrhythmia stickers.
  • A hand written thank you note.
  • Put in game credits under Super Donators!
  • I will make a BeatMap from a song of your choice. (Will be available via download from server)

Direct contact with the team. ($250)

  • Get access to development builds of game as well as the final game.
  • Gets you access to digital downloads of Arrhythmia backgrounds.
  • All 8 Arrhythmia stickers.
  • A hand written thank you note.
  • Put in game credits under Super Donators!
  • I will make a BeatMap from a song of your choice. (Will be available via download from server)
  • Contact with the team (via Skype, email, or phone) to influence the game directly.

Stickers


Custom Splash


Background




Meet the Team

Liam Craver (Programmer / Graphics)

My name is Liam Craver, founder of Lime Studios and creator of Arrhythmia. I have years of experience in film, animation, graphic design, and (most importantly) programming. I currently am living in New Orleans and attending Benjamin Franklin High School for regular studies as well as the New Orleans Center for Creative Arts (NOCCA) for media arts.

Patrick Burtchaell (Lead Designer)

Patrick Burtchaell is a freelance designer and a videographer from New Orleans. He is a home schooled senior and attends the New Orleans Center for the Creative Arts for media arts.

Leo Garcia (Musician)

My name is Leonardo Garcia and I am a freelance artist. I have years of experience in film, sound design, computer engineering and more. I'm also currently going to Prince George High while living in Fort Lee‏.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t pledge money, that’s cool, we understand. Just spread the word about Arrhythmia to friends and family! We’d love to see this Game to fruition. It’s going to have some great game-play and it’s going to be loaded with awesome content. With your help we can get this sucker finished!

Thanks so much for all your support guys! You guys make this whole coding thing worth it!
story_txt:
AwardsRegional Gold Key awarded by the Scholastic Art and Writing competition.Quotes"Are you looking for a challenge, because this challenge is LOOKING FOR YOU"- Noah Waltzer
"Did someone say music AND clicking?!" - Taylor Ian Snead
"Looking for a challenge, this game is for you." - Richard Rico Rubio"Play Arrhythmia or be SQUARE!" - Patrick BurtchaellAbout Arrhythmia“Wouldn't it be cool to have game-play directly created by a song?”This question interested me so much that during my Friday coding jam session I decided to try my hand at making such a game a reality. Thus Arrhythmia was born! Arrhythmia's gameplay is created by the community that plays it for the most part, with the only exception being the official beatmap pack that comes prebuilt into the game. I wanted it to be a self sustaining community. When new music comes out the community can turn the music into new beatmaps for other people to play with the in game beatmap editor. Beatmaps consist of a folder holding a music file, an album cover, and a beatmap file. All of these combine to create the gameplay within the game. After they are made they then can be uploaded to our servers to be downloaded by other Arrhythmia users using the in game downloader.The point of Arrhtyhmia is to stay alive all the way through the song / beatmap you choose. You loose a bit of your health every time you collide with an object / projectile emitted from the cube in the center of the game screen.Project SummarySince Arrhythmia's conception we have been spending nearly all our free time on making it better. Arrhythmia is at a point were yes it is at least presentable, but we've come to IndieGoGo in the hopes that we can make it even more refined and better with your help! With your support, we want to buy the required tools and services to make Arrhythmia even better then it is already! In order to accomplish this, we're hoping to raise $2,500 with this IndieGoGo project.What We Need & What You GetThe majority of the money raised will go towards the following...
Unity Pro Licence - $1500
A better server (to host beatmaps and user data) - $500
Fees associated with Steam / Humble Bundle - $100+
The rest will then be going towards paying for the rewards and IndieGoGo fees. However, that doesn't mean we have to stop there! If more money then the campaign's initial amount is raised we can offer each of you more bang for your buck. Such as...
Commission more musicians to make an original soundtrack for arrhythmia that would serve as a built in campaign mode for Arrhythmia.
Offer better / additional perks then those originally stated! Such as additional alpha codes for your friends!
Thanks! / Upgrade My Perk! ($1+)
Thanks anything helps! 
Use this perk if you want to up the tier of your original perk purchase.
Gives you access to digital downloads of Arrhythmia backgrounds.
Pre-Order the Game! ($6)
You get the finished game at a discounted price! Final game will cost $10.

Gives you access to digital downloads of Arrhythmia backgrounds.

Access to Development Builds! ($12)
Get access to development builds of game as well as the final game.

Contact with the team (via Skype, email, or phone) to influence the game directly.

I have years of experience in film, animation, graphic design, and (most importantly) programming. I currently am living in New Orleans and attending Benjamin Franklin High School for regular studies as well as the New Orleans Center for Creative Arts (NOCCA) for media arts.Patrick Burtchaell (Lead Designer)Patrick Burtchaell is a freelance designer and a videographer from New Orleans. He is a home schooled senior and attends the New Orleans Center for the Creative Arts for media arts.Leo Garcia (Musician)My name is Leonardo Garcia and I am a freelance artist. I have years of experience in film, sound design, computer engineering and more. story:
// What is Game Gorilla?

Most of us have on occasion borrowed a game or two from our friends - games that we were not only excited to play, but equally as excited to not have to pay for the experience. Most of the time, that same friend might have wanted to borrow a game from you - a mutually beneficial endeavor to say the least.

Now imagine having the ability to trade your games with people across the entire country, not just your close circle of friends.

At Game Gorilla, we offer just that. Our patented algorithm matches up users from across the country and allows them to trade their games with each other in the safest environment possible. Consequently, your circle of friends just got much bigger. And here's the good part, all users deal with us directly, and we guarantee a successful trade from the beginning to the end of the process.

We can't complete this endeavor without you. As a contributor, you will be helping us establish the best interactive web experience possible. The interface of Game Gorilla is extremely easy to use. Users will list the games they want to trade, as well as input the games they desire. We take care of the rest. One of the benefits of Game Gorilla is that users never have to deal with the general public. All games come through our facility where they will all go through a 10-point inspection process before being sent to their respective owners. When your game is sent to you, you can be assured that it will be in 100% working condition.


 // The Breakdown

  • Trade next generation console games with anyone across the US for $5 plus S&H.*
  • List the games you own for the games you want, using our simple drop-down-box interface. Our custom algorithm takes care of the rest.
  • Once a match is found and both parties accept, a prepaid envelope is immediately sent to both parties.
  • When both games arrive at our facility, the inspection process begins and games are shipped out within one business day.
  • Enjoy your brand new game, it's yours to keep forever!


 // Why Us?


There are a lot of choices out there to obtain new games. Why choose Game Gorilla?

In order to best answer this question, let's take a look at some of the other choices out there.

  • Renting: One of the more popular choices. While game renting is convenient and easy to use, most services require a monthly fee. That fee automatically deducts from your bank account every month regardless of how often you actually used the service. In addition, the games you rent are not yours to keep. You have to return them in order to rent more games. One final note is liability. You break/lose it, you buy it.
  • Store Credit: Another option is to trade in your used games for store credit at your local game store. Much like a car, the moment you leave the store, your $60 game just massively depreciated. A person would typically have to trade in several games in order to accumulate enough store credit to buy a new game.
  • Auction/Listings: Using an auction or listing site, can generally save you money on a new game, but it also has its risks, namely, having to deal with the general public. While some of these sites have reputation systems implemented, you're still taking a risk.




So why Game Gorilla?

  • Cost Effective: Regardless of the fluctuations of pricing - age of a game, market changes etc, every trade will always cost $5. From a cost perspective, Game Gorilla offers the best deal around by far.
  • Easy to use: Once your games are posted, Game Gorilla does all the work for you - right down to the pre-paid envelopes we send to your door. There is no easier way to get the games you want to play.
  • Safe: Game Gorilla takes the place of the general public. All users deal directly with us. We 100% guarantee successful trades. In addition to this and unlike other services, your new game is yours to keep forever. It has become your property. You may keep it always or trade it again at a later time. There is no liability at any time for any one of our users.

 // Our Goals:

The more money we raise for this project, the better Game Gorilla will be at launch. With these contributions we aim to build and improve Game Gorilla's overall design and functionality for the best possible user experience. In addition, if we meet our goal of $50,000 USD, we will be able to add an even bigger database that will not only inclue PS4 and Xbox One games, but Xbox 360, PS3, and Wii U games as well.

Please help make our dreams a reality! Every little bit helps, no donation is too small. Please help spread the word about this new and exciting service!

 // Screenshots:

Below are some screenshots from the actual web app that is currently under development.


Home Page - Simply sign in or register to get started



The Dashboard - Managing your games and trades is easy



Adding your games - Select the game you have / want and the packaging



Managing Your Account - Modify your shipping address and payment information



Mobile Friendly - You can add/remove games, and view / accept trades directly from your mobile device


*S&H are not included with trades. Shipping costs may vary depending on current rates. Shipping rates per disc are roughly $2. We never charge more than current rates for shipping.

**High Priority trades will automatically move your games to the front of the queue allowing for much faster trading. (Get it now before it's a feature!)

story:
About us

Gaspez-arts Miniatures is a small company that produces high quality miniatures for Fantasy Football or Gdr. 

Our goal is to provide the players with very high quality casts and a big selection of alternative models to create their teams or expand the existing ones. 

To achieve this result we have always cooperated with some of the top sculptors available on the market.

We produced great sculptures, highly detailed and characterful.

Between them, we've produced very collectible sexy pin-ups and we need now your help to continue to produce them!

And we'll offer to all contributors a reduced price and FREE SHIPPING WHERE EVER YOU LIVE that it will be a great effort since the cost and the restricted price of these jewels! 

And there will be amazing extras!


How can you help us?


This campagn will last 30 days and we will need at last 500 euros to be funded, and you can take these beautiful miniatures at excellent price with free shipping worldwide!
These are our pin-ups available in this campaign, at reduced price and with free shipping!
















In this indiegogo Campaign we will also present also two amazing news that you won't still find on our website!

We need funds to cast them... so you can preorder them at special prices directly from the perk  <<SINGLE PIN-UP PERK>> OR  <<ALL PIN-UPs>> !



The basic PERKS


SINGLE PIN-UP PERK:

This perk will give you access to one metal gaspez-arts' pin-up between the 14 of this campaign! 

At the end you will choose the ones you want. 

This perk will cost to you only 7€  included shipping worldwide!

***** FREE SHIPPING *****


ALL PIN-UPs :

This perk will give you access to the entire set of 14 pin-ups, included the two exclusive girls (cow-girl and policewoman) still don't available at our website!

It's a great effort for us since the whole cost of the shipping !

It won't include stretch goals!

This perk will cost to you only 89€  included shipping worldwide!

***** FREE SHIPPING *****


ALL PIN-UPs  *** EARLY BIRD ***:

This perk will give you access to the set of 14 pin-ups, included the two exclusive girls (cow-girl and policewoman) still don't available at our website!

IT WILL INCLUDE ALL STRETCH GOALS!!!!

It's a great effort for us since the whole cost of the shipping !

This perk will cost to you only 79€  included shipping worldwide!

***** FREE SHIPPING *****


STRETCH GOAL


500€ Funded !!!



1000€  Every "ALL PIN-UPS" backer will receive SAMANTHA, a fantastic cheerleader for free !!!

So you'll obtain 15 marvellous pin-up with a perk!




2000€  ... a special surprise for "all pin-ups" backers...!!!!


Risks & Challenges

There are no risks... miniatures are already available on our website:

www.gaspez-arts.it .

I'll start to send them a week after the end of the campaign!

story:
If you don't want to read all this smooth talk, go PLAY KARTOON 

(but please come back right after that) http://www.facebook.com/Kartoongame

We believe that Facebook players need more quality games, not marketing and statistics driven. In a word, fun games. 

In the middle of a mysterious desert, occurred quasi-supernatural events...
Disgusting little insects sprouted from the ground and multiplied after an enigmatic meteorite hit the village nearby.
But these small insects have interesting properties, once you know how to manipulate them. 

After some DIY-job, farmers have succeeded in extracting a strange fluid from them that boosts tractors and turns them into fast cars, or that turn vegetables and fruits into destructive weapons.

Let's enter Kartoon's world in pictures 

That's Roy. We're going to help him, or he’s going to help us drive our first fast car, depending on the point of view. He's not super-confident so we'll need to take this mission cautiously.

In the beginning, Roy looked like this

 

Hopefully, dirty Sancho is here to help us but he'll probably make us go through the mill...

 

So you'll need to demonstrate your pilot skills on upgraded tractors that went through different evolutions called experimental vehicles.

 

This is your first vehicle. Don't worry. You'll be able to customize it with motors, wheels, shields, tanks...

 

 

… and if you are good you'll get karts like those :

 

Finally, you'll start in the Canyon map, which also went through different development steps. As you can see, video games are just drawings at the beginning...

 

 

Oh, and I almost forgot! Your weapons are these terrible fruits and vegetables stuffed with fluid. Caution: KEEP CHILDREN AWAY! 

 

Eventually, you'll need them to face off with the bundles of straws that lay dangerously on the ground, the vindictive moles, and soon the merciless cows as well! But why are those animals THAT mean? You have to understand them. They feel left behind because no one takes care of them any longer since all the farmers have become fond of tractor races...It pisses them off!


 

We still have a lot of great ideas to put into that game to improve it.

It will be possible ... thanks to you

 

 

What are the funds for ?

The funds we are hoping to raise will allow us to develop the game and make major improvements. These improvements are absolutely crucial to help the game be an international success: as cool as Kartoon may seem, it needs more completion and advancement to reach thousands of players – that will bring success.

Kartoon is a free-to-play game: it’s free and you can play it on Facebook. If the players wish to, they can pay small amounts of money to play more, or to buy more efficient equipment.

Improvements :

- A multi-players mode in real time: Race against your friends in real time, anywhere, at any time on Facebook. This is the ideal feature and we need a lot of time and resources – a lot more than 10 000€ 

- Other missions, other enemies: We'll have to create a lot of them for the players to not be bored and to constantly provide new challenges.

- Tournaments: Players will be able to bet with virtual currency and win high quality equipment; there is nothing better for competitive racers.

- Artificial Intelligence: NPC (non player characters) for players to train racing.

- New maps: It's important for the replay value. Players need to have different fields and environments anytime it is possible.

- "Ghosts": These are records of friends' races: players can see the ghosts of their friends on the road when they’re not currently playing from the previous games.

- New weapons, equipment, vehicles: In order to diversify what we offer to the players and to propose a huge range of funny equipment to customize the karts.

As you can understand, there is still a lot of work to do. We are proud of what we have already achieved, but there is a long way to go before the game is economically viable. 

We ask for 10 000€. It is both ambitious and merely not enough. Developing a game is very expensive, and we secretly hope to exceed this sum...See what happened to this Minimal Pen on Kickstarter (Indiegogo-like website) They asked for $2500 and got $300 000!! Let's show that Europeans can also massively back-up a project they believe in!

Finally, funds will also help us buy the counterparts! If we obtain what we need, you'll have collector items, 3D figurines, and credits to be used in the game...And if you are very generous, you'll get your own 3D character in the game...

 

Kartoon T-shirt :

 

 

 

The Team

At the beginning, we were two friends, Lucas and Alex, with an idea: make the Facebook games funnier, nicer, 3Dier! It was April 2011, and we've come such a long way. 

The idea couldn’t be that bad because Florent joined us, then Yohann, Yoann, Florian and finally Mehdi. 1 art director, 1 game designer and 3 programmers.

This team of 7 created the video game studio Kadank We hope to go far and create awesome games. As we use a multi-platform development tool (Unity3D) we'll be able to launch the games on smartphones, tablets, chrome and apple stores...

Here is the team :

Thank you !

 

and many thanks to Stéphane for the video : mouzymouz@gmail.com

Kartoon T-shirt :

 
 
 
The Team
At the beginning, we were two friends, Lucas and Alex, with an idea: make the Facebook games funnier, nicer, 3Dier! It was April 2011, and we've come such a long way. 
The idea couldn’t be that bad because Florent joined us, then Yohann, Yoann, Florian and finally Mehdi. 1 art director, 1 game designer and 3 programmers.
This team of 7 created the video game studio Kadank We hope to go far and create awesome games. As we use a multi-platform development tool (Unity3D) we'll be able to launch the games on smartphones, tablets, chrome and apple stores...
Here is the team :

Thank you !
 
and many thanks to Stéphane for the video : mouzymouz@gmail.com

story:
Utterpedia takes crowd opinion to those that need to listen so they can make change in your world.

My Story

For as long as I can remember, every time I saw a TV advert or results of a poll in a newspaper for example, it provoked me to rant about me never being asked my opinion, and the honesty of what I was reading considering so few people had been asked.

You've probably all seen an advert on TV saying something along the lines of 98% of women love the 'new haircare product'. And in tiny writing at the bottom of the screen it says '98% of 250 women asked'. Asking 250 people cannot possibly represent all women for example. But if 20 million women were asked, then 98% would actually mean something.

You've also probably seen a piece in the media saying that 80% of people support going to war, or a certain political party are more popular at this current time, or 70% of the population understand high fuel costs for example.

Current opinion polls are unrepresentative because so few people are asked. Therefore nobody in power acknowledges the results.

When was the last time you were asked your opinion? When was the last time your opinion actually made a difference?

People want to communicate their thoughts and often passionate opinions to those in power but the platform simply doesn't exist.

Until now...

The Idea Was Born

Millions of people will be able to have their say in one central place, and their important opinions will be distributed to the relevant people and organisations that need to listen. That's Governments, Companies, the Media, Charities, etc.

Utterpedia will also inform and entertain. We'll provide easily digestable information on the topics that matter to make it easier for people to understand both sides of the story, and right next to that information, we'll publish the results of mass crowd opinion.

Utterpedia promises to push for change. We'll physically take crowd opinion to those in power - the people that need to listen and act upon the information they receive. There'll be no more ignoring your opinion.

Examples of How Important Your Opinion Is

Oil companies and governments would have to sit up and listen and take action if tens of millions of people answered 'yes' to petrol prices being far too high.

Companies would change products and improve customer service if crowd opinion asked for it.

Governments would enter more open debates if the majority of the population voted against austerity measures.

The world is our oyster

Obviously above are merely a couple of the more serious examples of where massive crowd opinion can really have an impact. When we have everyone together in one central place, the world is our oyster in terms of what we can change for the better. And perhaps you'd like to know exactly what 90% of people that have bought a particular product really think of that product before you spend your cash. There are so many possibilities for Utterpedia to put the power in the people's hands.

The Power of the Internet

With the power of the internet, getting so many people into once place on Utterpedia is a concept of reality. It truly will be a positive revolution, putting power in your hands to make change.

The Team

The team behind Utterpedia has a great deal of experience building online brands, and has worked on some of the largest websites on the internet. We have the idea and the skills to develop & market it, but we need your help to give it a kickstart!

How you can help

We've set our goal at $10,000, but really that's an arbitrary figure... the more money we raise, the more people we can reach and the quicker we can reach them, so please help us over-reach our goal in the most impressive way!

We would love you to contribute and grab yourself one of the fanastic perks on offer, but if you can't contribute, we'd still really appreciate your support by telling your friends, and talking about our campaign on social media such as Facebook and Twitter.

We'd also really appreciate it if you could visit www.utterpedia.com and enter your email address so we can tell you when the main Utterpedia.com is up and running.

And please like our Facebook page (http://www.facebook.com/utterpedia), and follow us on Twitter (http://twitter.com/utterpedia).

THANK YOU!

Perks for Contributors Exclusive to Indiegogo

story:
Cerasis Quest is a story book with mini-games for iOS, we need funds to complete our work!


What is "Cerasis Quest"?

Cerasis Quest is a graphic tale with illustrations, quizzes and brain-teasers. The app isn't finished yet so it's free at the moment, but it will become a paid application. We promise a free version of the complete app to all contributors (even just  1€ )! We also offer many rewards (see the rewards section). We plan to complete the app as early as possible (probably September 2015). We will update this page and post all our progress on the Facebook page! You can try the current game for free, we have made the first chapter of the story.


CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD THE APP FROM APPLESTORE (free download)


The gameplay is very simple. You read the fantasy story, followed by music and manga-style illustrations, interacting with story-solving quizzes and other mini-games.

     


Prologue: "It was a holiday in the kingdom of Aurantìaco, when a mysterious flying octopus interrupted the royal engagement festivities and kidnapped the prince. Help Princess Cerasis find her love, accompany her on this fantastic adventure. Read the story, take the quizzes, navigate the labyrinths, tackle the brain-teasers and other games. What mysterious and interesting characters will you encounter during your walk? Find out along with the Princess."

We produce all the drawings in pencil, then we ink them and finally we color them on the computer.

    


    


The world of Cerasis Quest is divided into 6 different areas (prologue + 5 chapters). On the map of the game you unlock different worlds as you complete these chapters. Each chapter will contains two or more mini-games. The mini-games can be quizzes, memory games, mazes, puzzles, or games of skill.


In each chapter, new characters are added. We have already sketched out the various characters.


We created an original soundtrack for the game. We used an electric guitar, sound effects, and Garage Band for Ipad. Several music pieces accompany the story. We have created themes for each event: fantasy, mysterious, fairy-tale, etc. ...
MUSIC of the PROLOGUE
MUSIC of the FOREST

MUSIC of the LABYRINTH


    Of course this wouldn't be a crowdfunding effort without goodies to help motivate you to contribute. The rewards will be shipped Immediately AFTER the conclusion of the campaign. These are the rewards we're offering.

    THE REWARDS ARE:

    1€ 

    • Free download of the complete version of the app.
    • A "Facebook thank you message" on our Facebook page.


    5€

    • Your name on the credits
    • Free download of the complete version of the app.
    • A "Facebook thank you message" on our Facebook page.


    10€ THE REWARD IS

    • Exclusive unpublished HD wallpaper.
    • Your name on the credits.
    • Free download of the complete version of the app.
    • A "Facebook thank you message" on our Facebook page.


    15€ THE REWARD IS

    • PDF artbook with sketches and studies of the characters.
    • Exclusive unpublished HD wallpaper.
    • Your name on the credits.
    • Free download of the complete version of the app.
    • A "Facebook thank you message" on our Facebook page.


    40€ THE REWARD IS

    • Exclusive 5 high-quality postcards. (include shipping cost from italy to your country)
    • PDF artbook with sketches and studies of the characters.
    • Exclusive unpublished HD wallpaper.
    • Your name on the credits.
    • Free download of the complete version of the app.
    • A "Facebook thank you message" on our Facebook page.


    60€ THE REWARD IS

    • An original 21cm x 29.7cm SKETCH SIGNED BY CHARACTER DESIGNER.(including shipping cost from italy to your country)
    • PDF artbook with sketches and studies of the characters.
    • Exclusive unpublished HD wallpaper.
    • Your name on the credits.
    • Free download of the complete version of the app.
    • A "Facebook thank you message" on our Facebook page.


    100€ THE REWARD IS

    • An original 21cm x 29.7cm SKETCH SIGNED BY ALL STAFF. (including shipping cost from italy to your country)
    • Exclusive 5 high-quality postcards.
    • PDF artbook with sketches and studies of the characters.
    • Exclusive unpublished HD wallpaper.
    • Your name on the credits.
    • Free download of the complete version of the app.
    • A "Facebook thank you message" on our Facebook page.


    500€ THE REWARD IS

    • All previous rewards
    • Your name given to one of the characters (in the final chapter).


    We guarantee that everyone will receive their rewards!




    Our staff is:
    • Francesca Picchiorri
    • Daniele "Warui"
    • Emiliano Picchiorri
    • The IOS developer

    Other Ways You Can Help

    • Tell your friends about our campaign

    • Share our app and campaign on your facebook profile and pages

      For any questions write us at:

      cerasis@wakoon.com

story:
Samurai Legends

Samurai Legends is an Action Adventure Game with RPG elements.
It is set in Feudal Japan at the end of the 15th century.
The game has been influenced by titles from the "Way of the Samurai", "Onimusha" and "Ninja Gaiden" Series.
All of these are games, that have almost exclusively appeared on video game consoles.
But we think that there is an audience for such titles on the PC as well.
The project started back in 2010 and is still in its early development stages. 

 

Why we need your support

Up to now we had relied on unpaid help due to lack of funds.  Unfortunately you can never tell how long these talents will stick around.
Full time jobs, personal life and family always are priority.
As a result, some of the great people who have helped us in the past had to pull out of the project,
due to various reasons (private life, uni exams, etc.).

 

Your donations would help us in acquiring the services of graphic artists, programmers, voice talents,

music composers and sound engineers.

 

We are also considering porting over to a new engine (1300$), in order to publish on multiple platforms (including Mac OSX). However this is still under discussion.

 

 

What you will get in return

Beside our eternal gratitude, there are multiple rewards for your generous donations.
Depending on the amount of your donation, these rewards range from your name on the Sponsors list

of our Website, to getting a special "Ninja" edition of the game. You can find more information regarding the rewards on the perks list.

Even the smallest contribution would help the development of "Samurai Legends" and bring us a little bit
closer to making our dream become reality.

 

Other Ways You Can Help


If you are unable to donate, that's okay. 

You can still help us by spreading the word about our campaign. Tell your friends, tweet about it on the internet. The more people know about our campaign, the higher is  our chance of achieving our goal !

story:
Vanguard Meeples are the ultimate game pieces. Constructed from solid metal, and plated in 5 distinct finishes, they can easily replace ordinary pawns, meeples, or tokens in your favorite board games!

Vanguard Meeples have over eight times the mass of standard meeples, weighing in at an impressive 10.5 grams each. The metallic plating is extremely durable, and has an amazing luster and feel.

Each Vanguard Meeple is custom molded and goes through a rigorous series of quality control checks to eliminate the irregularities and mis-cuts that are so common in cheap wooden pawns and plastic tokens.


5 Reasons You Need Vanguard Meeples

  1. Brilliant: Real metal has a shine and luster that plastic or painted wood simply can't match! The sparkling finish of Vanguard Meeples is breathtaking!
  2. Gravitas: The heft and dignity of Vanguard Meeples is unmistakable, making them natural leaders for your armies!
  3. Just the Right Size: Upgrading your favorite game has never been so easy! Vanguard Meeples are the same size as stock meeples and most other game pieces, so you know they'll fit!
  4. Unmatched Durability: Metal has many benefits over wood, plastic, and polymer - not the least of which is its durability. With these pieces, you can play in the wind, rain, snow, sun, or at a pub, without fear of damage! 
  5. How Handy: Best of all, our exclusive design includes a functional "hand" that allows you to customize your games in ways never before possible! Whether you want a flag-bearer, wizard's staff, or just more factions, this hand makes it easy to expand your force to fit your needs!


SIZING:

  • Height: .625"
  • Width: .625"
  • Thickness: .375"
  • Weight: 10.5g
  • Hand Size: .040"

FINISHES:

  • Solar: Shiny Golden
  • Lunar: Shiny Slivered
  • Eclipse: Shiny Black
  • Dawn: Aged Brassy Yellow
  • Dusk: Aged Coppery Red


 

What could be better than sharing the things you love with the people in your life? Earning free goodies at the same time!

It's really easy to get free stuff: after you contribute for a perk, stay logged in and share this project using the buttons at the top!

Every person who contributes through your shares will earn you a **FREE** Vanguard Meeple! There's no limit to the number of times you can share, or the number of Vanguards you can earn! Even better, once you have earned 25 Vanguards, you'll also get a special travel case only available through this contest!

Need more info on Referral Contests? Check out this nifty IndieGoGo article!

How to Contribute

It's easy to get the Vanguards you crave! Just click the perk that's perfect for you and proceed through the checkout process. Your contribution will be processed immediately via PayPal, and we'll get to work creating your items!

Your contribution can not be changed after you pledge, but have no fear, you don't have to miss out on getting more goodies! You can receive as many perks as you desire! Simply contribute again to add more perks to your shipment! Our software will compile all of your contributions together so that we can mail all of your perks and freebies together in one epic package!

We anticipate shipping perks at the beginning of December. Have no fear, that won't seem like such a wait thanks to Updateday! As with all Bibelot Games projects, we'll be posting weekly updates throughout the production phase. Updateday (every Monday) is a spirited and exciting behind-the-scenes overview of the creation and production process where we share the details of our progress.

Perk Details

All perks include FREE Shipping to US and Canadian addresses!

This perk includes 1 metal Vanguard meeple of each finish (Dawn, Dusk, Lunar, Solar, Eclipse) packaged inside a black velveteen bag.


Pick this perk to snag an 8 piece set of Vanguard Meeples in your favorite finish! (after the campaign, we'll email you to find out which one you want) Each set comes packaged in a black velveteen bag!


The perfect perk for head-to-head matches! The Dynamic Duo set includes 8 Dawn and 8 Dusk Vanguard Meeples in a black velveteen bag!


Eclipse and Solar and Lunar, Oh My! This set contains 24 total Vanguards (8 each of 3 finishes) packaged in a velveteen bag! It's all the shining goodness you need to make your 3-player games come to life!


The Complete Set is just the right size for most gamers! It contains 8 metal Vanguard meeples in each of the 5 finishes (40 meeples total) and is packaged in a lovely velveteen bag!

This perk is perfectly sized to replace Carcassonne's plain wooden followers with luxurious metal Vanguards!


Get your game night off to the right start with this travel-friendly boxed set of 40 metal Vanguard meeples!

This set contains 8 meeples of each finish snugly packaged in a LASER cut and etched foam insert perfectly fitted to the small 8" x 5", Gamer Vaultz® case.

The Gamer Vaultz® case is perfect for all of your gaming needs, featuring a keyed lock, mesh pouches inside the lid for extra storage, a pen loop, and a clipboard on the front for score cards and notes!


Containing a massive 120 Vanguard Meeples, the Ultimate Gamer Boxed Set is perfect for gamers who play big! The large 8.5" x 11" Gamer Vaultz® case is the perfect storage solution for your Vanguard Meeples and accessories, plus all of your standard gaming equipment (dice, score cards, pens, etc...).

The Ultimate Gamer Boxed Set includes: 24 Solar, 24 Lunar, 24 Eclipse, 24 Dawn, and 24 Dusk Vanguard Meeples, sorted into groups of eight, and neatly nested into precision cut and etched foam.

The inside of the lid features multiple mesh pockets for easy accessory storage, plus a handy pen loop. The front of the Gamer Vaultz® case functions as a clipboard to make it super easy to take notes, keep score, or hold your character sheets!


Whether you're looking for the latest and greatest bit of awesome for your FLGS, want to replace all your game pieces, or have the goal of winning Christmas, Metal Meeple Madness is the perfect perk for you!

Weighing in at more than 10 pounds, the 4" x 6" Meeple Vaultz® chest contains a truly amazing 500 meeples (100 of each finish), making it a perfect counter-top display or game closet accessory! 


All of our perks include FREE shipping to the USA and CANADA. If you require shipping to any other country then you will need to make an additional contribution for the International Shipping perk.


Wahooooo! We did it! Vanguard Meeples WILL be made!

Yippppppeeeeee! Another one down! Now, every single contributor getting a perk will ALSO get a FREE Vanguard Keychain*!


*Small print: Contributors must pledge for a physical perk to receive the free keychain. Only available in Lunar.

Wowsa! 500% funded is a massive milestone that will make it possible for us to produce Flagpoles for your Vanguard meeples!


The poles are specially designed to fit inside the Vanguard hand and are shaped to stay in place. They are plated in the same 5 finishes as the Vanguards, so you can match them to your armies, or mix things up to create even more distinct factions!

New Perk: $10 Raise the Flag - This kit includes 120 flagpoles, 24 of each finish, and a full sheet of 154 blank flag stickers!

1,000% funded is no small feat! In tribute to all of you amazing supporters, we'll be making it even easier for you to showcase your love of Vanguard Meeples! At this marker, we'll also give everyone receiving a perk a FREE Vanguard Necklace*!

*Small print: Contributors must pledge for a physical perk to receive the free necklace. Only available in Lunar.

WAHOOOOOO! We have to do something epic for this colossal goal! But what's monumental enough for one-thousand, five hundred percent funded???!!!

Gem Staffs!

At this milestone, we'll be able to produce brilliantly shiny, cut-glass studded staffs made in the following colors: diamond, jet, emerald, ruby, and sapphire! These staffs fit perfectly into your Vanguard's hands, allowing you to colorize your forces, while keeping all that glorious sparkle and shine!

New Perk: Gem Staffs - This kit includes 40 Gem Staffs, 8 each of 5 colors!

But wait! There's more! Once we decimate these goals, we'll add even more awesome achievements!

Even better, you can help us decide what's next by sharing your thoughts in the comments!

Bibelot Games is an Independent Game company based just outside of Phoenix, AZ. We take pride in developing amazingly unique and luxurious games and game accessories!

Bibelot Games is running this project with the help and support of...

The Ring Lord is a world-renowned metal fabrication company specializing the manufacture of craft rings for chainmail (maille) jewelry and armor. "We make it - You create it!"
