However, the most loyal followers of Seth facing the fact that they do not possess enought power to rescue their leader, they did what every faithful scribe would do. The left a message, the fabled Scrolls of Resurrection, hoping that one day someone will have what it takes to bring their god back into life. The scrolls became a legend, until now. For the wind whispers words of dark magic coming from the mysterious ancient temple not that far away...

Ancient Kemet the Game is created by two brothers, Dom Tollhotep and Rob AmunRob, who combined their passion for ancient Egypt with an eye for graphics and brain for programming. Not only all the visuals and game style, but even the engine that runs the game was created by us. We added to that our experience with other games and what we would have done differently and what concepts we liked. Ancient Kemet is a creation of passion and fascination, because all the aspects of this project are something we both are passionate about and fascinated by.

To make Ancient Kemet alive, we have split the project into three stages:1) Alpha testing stage2) Beta testing stage3) Ancient Kemet version 1.0
In this Indiegogo campaing we would like to raise funding for alpha testing, which we want to execute in May. Based on all the feedback we get, we want Beta testing up shortly after and then rinse and repeat, Ancient Kemet full version goes live.

For alpha testing stage we want to raise 4 000 EUR to cover our cost for graphics, development, software licenses, sound production and of course, servers. On top of that we would like to get like-minded players fascinated with Ancient Egypt in for the actual testing to help us with their feedback, their ideas.
Let's have a quick overview of the alpha testing scenario
Alpha testing will be based on the scenario of 2 nomes, each with a town with its own ground reserved for gathering resources for basic professions. In between the nomes there will be a free PVP combat zone, where players will find more expensive resources.
There are going to be several character professions in the final version of the game, for aplha testing we picked four: farming, blacksmithing, crafting and fishing. These will be the basic means for getting on your feet with gaining extra gear and materials you need.
On top of that, at the end of the combat zone players will find a mystical Temple of Resurrection, where our innovative concept of raiding is to be tested.

Temple of Resurrection – New raid concept
In alpha stage there will be one major PVP raid which will lead into the Temple of Resurrection. After conquering the enemy team from the other nome you will gain access to an ancient artefact, that will grant you enourmous power and transform you into the dark servants of Seth. It will be your role to hold the temple against enemy and shall you succeed, you will be rewarded greatly.
If you happen to loose the fight for the artefact, your chance comes in defeating the monsters in the temple itself, who are in fact, players from the other nome.
The most important thing from alpha testing stage?Your feedback :)

We are very grateful for all your contributions and we will keep you posted with all news from Ancient Kemet through our campaing here on Indiegogo, on our website and on Facebook as well.
All the rewards are connected with the game itself and whether you wish to play in the later stages after more content has been added or you want to jump in as a game moderator straight away, there are contribution options for all. The spaces for alpha testing are limited though.
Thank you
Thank you for your time, your interest and your support. If you have a question, want to drop us a line or would like to stay up to date, follow us on Facebook or check out our Ancient Kemet website.

story:
Meatball Factory the game:

Meatball Factory is already out there, you can find the game on Facebook and try it out. But, we need your help to finish the project, we want to port it to Android and Iphone/Ipad and make a promo video (quite funny). We where supposed to end the game earlier, but we added some more features and are running low on fuel.

  • The game is being produced by AJIS, a small company that hopes to fund more original ideas in the future. The games is being created & developed by IN Studios (www.instudios.ca) which used to work mainly in VFX and 3D assets creations but is now offering dev capacities. The team has been now cut down to two guys Alexandre Joset & Jean-François Genest.

  • We really think our game is a great and fun game that offers puzzle aspects and arcade/action fun. We have build it for Facebook first, since it was easier for us to dev and test. But, we are convinced that it is definitely a product that would be interesting on phones and mobile devices since you can play quick little rounds whenever you like.
  • By funding our project you are giving us the chance to distribute our product on other platforms. This, in return, should give us more visibility and the opportunity to generate enough interest and money to produce other great projects. Also, you get to receive cool gifts... isn't that awesome?

So feel free to play the game on Facebook, there is a free chapter to try out. Then encourage us here by funding us, you can basically pre-order the game for a small amount of money or buy our promo items.


What We Need

As said, our goal is to reach 12 600$ dollars. This will:

  • Pay the bills for our small team (Alexandre & J-F) and give us something to reward people that have contributed to the game (Music & graphics).
  • Give us a little budget to film and edit a really funny commercial (involving meatballs) that we want to put on Youtube.
  • Give us a little budget to promo on Facebook, Google and Apple store.
  • ***If we don't reach the 12 600$ goals, we will still try to port it to android at the least. Our priority are as follows:
    1-Port to android.
    2-Do the Youtube commercial
    3-Port to Iphone & Ipad
    4-Port to windows phone
    Also, about 20% of what will be funded will be given back to the people who helped us to create the game (Music and graphics).

 What You Get

We though of a few cool rewards for you, you can look at the Perks --->

But to give you a better idea, here are examples of what we are talking about:

Get the game & unlock all levels*:

When you try out the game, the machine selection will look like this:



If you buy the whole game, or the Gamer perk, you unlock the whole game, which looks like this (3 more machines/worlds if you scroll down + bonus levels):


Chest and coins:

In Meatball Factory, you get 1 coin for each shaker that you hit: 

These coins are added to your chest and can be used to buy powerups as you can see here:


So if you get the CHEF'S PACK, you will have a + 1000 chest capacity and + 1000 coins in it:



And if you get the SUPER PACK, you will have a + 2000 chest capacity and + 2000 coins in it:


T-Shirt (Showing off perk)**:

Here is the beautiful t-Shirt that you will be wearing to display your truly generous offer:


Poster (Flag bearer perk)**:

Here is the poster that we will send to you:


Your name engraved in a bonus level  (Ultimate backer perk):

In this case, the offer is limited since we cannot add more bonus rounds in the game. Your name will be engraved in the BG of the bonus levels:


IMPORTANT NOTICES:

*If you wan't to get your copy of Meatball Factory and other in game bonus (Coins & Chests), we will need you to include your Facebook ID number in your demand. To help you find it, here is a link:
http://findmyfacebookid.com/

**International shipping may require some additional fees. Also, it may take an additional month for you to receive your t-shirt or poster since we will only print them once we get funded.


The Impact

Your funding will make a difference, not only for Meatball Factory, but for the future of our team.

  • By funding our project, you are helping us finish our project and you get to have fun with our game (& accessories! :) ).
  • We have already proven that we can achieve projects like this, as you can notice we already completed the Facebook version of this project. 
  • Also, you can have a look at our websites for more information about our background: www.ajis.ca & www.instudios.ca.
  • Finally, this game is hopefully just the first project of a long series of great projects! Keep watching for our incoming projects! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Funding us is one way to help, obviously, but making some noise and talking about our project is just as valuable!

  • Please share our Indiegogo project on Facebook.
  • And share the Facebook app page to your friends!
  • You can also use the Indiegogo share tools.
  • Or you can just talk about it (the old fashioned way).

Thank you for your time and your support!

story:
Our Story

We began our series as a way to teach and play board games with on-line viewers over YouTube.  Many modern games have long rule books and can be quite expensive.  Our series allows a viewer to learn the game and see it played, which we believe is one of the best ways to see if a game is right for you.

 

This process has been a lot of fun for us, and our viewers seem to be enjoying it as well, so we really want to be able to do this on a full time basis, which can be hard in the early days with no sponsors.  Although we have 1,600 subscribers and over 150,000 views on our channel, we are still in the early stages of growth, but we hope the quick growth of the series over the past few months indicates that we have something that will be of interest to a wider audience.  We're especially hoping some early financial assistance during this year will pay off into a self-sustaining video series.  

 

To see our channel, you can visit here: Watch It Played Youtube Channel

 

On our channel, our series are sorted into helpful playlists. However, if you would like a quick peek at one of our gameplay videos, you can go directly to this video: Summoner Wars Episode.

 

The Expectation We Have From Our Viewers

Zero.

 

The series has been fun to produce and we are grateful for all the fun we've been able to have with people on-line creating it.  If it has to end here, there will be no regrets.  If the viewers can help us keep it going, that would be fantastic, but not expected.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Realistically, I need to raise $20,000 to cover my income for the year, however, this is a hefty goal, and instead this fund raiser is being set for $5,000, representing the cost to fund a quarter of the year, with the hope that if more money can be raised, we can continue producing the series longer before having to reassess.

 

In particular, if we can grow the series over the next few months, then any future fund raising will be spread over more viewers, easing the burden and we may be able to attract the financial support of retailers or board game publishers who would like to be featured in our series.

 

To help with this, I will keep doing the show for another 2 months and any money raised will go towards keeping the show going starting March 1st (although the campaign will continue to be open until April to maximize out efforts).

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Anything you can do is appreciated, but not expected.

story:
Download the public beta!

(Full joystick and keyboard customization available in final version).



You can also help Greenlight us on Steam by voting yes, following, and commenting!
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=172529342






All of the funds raised will be used to pay for additional artists, musicians, and to cover all additional costs necessary to seeing the game through to completion.


Stretch goal Nº1 -  $11,000

More complex Boss Fights as well as more advanced A.I. for standard enemies.


Stretch goal Nº2 -  $12,000

Additional unique skills and techniques for each of the playable characters.


Stretch goal Nº3 -  $13,000

Additional detailed graphic animations for all characters and enemies.


Stretch goal Nº4 -  $14,000

The game will be made available in as many languages as we can.
Additional game challenge modes and mini-games.













The Dream King is a unique blend of multiple genres into one Side Scrolling Action Role Playing Game!  It is intended to capture the magic of the childhood classics of the early 80's and 90's gaming era!

The Dream King will be available on Windows, Ubuntu, Mac OS X, iOS, Android, Ouya, and hopefully Steam and Gamestick in 2014!

The game will immerse the player in a high fantasy world with a wide range of  developed characters and story! It is being produced for multiple platforms (including PC, Steam, Ouya, Gamestick, Android, and Iphone) and it is scheduled to be released in 2014. It offers the player an immense world to explore with a compelling cast and plot!

The game features elements from other classic games such as Mega Man, Final Fantasy, and Castlevania, but it will also feature Street Fighter moves and local cooperative and versus gameplay!











The Dream King plays in a non-linear "Metroidvania" style, where the player must navigate throughout a large world in order to find artifacts, weapons and abilities so that they can advance to other areas. It also combines elements from other genres such as vert-shooters with "bullet hell" or "curtain fire" gameplay!

There will be an enormous cast of over 20 playable characters,  each one being unique in how they help support the team in reaching the goal! A great amount of teamwork can be used to reach new areas, and the right combinations of characters and skill sets can be used to the teams advantage! The game will also feature a Versus Mode in which the players can battle one another and test out their skills!

Also, just like in the popular game Final Fantasy VII, Endica VII will have fun mini-games available within the main quest. These mini-games will be the dreams that the players have throughout the game, and can later on be accessible at any given time for even more 4-player excitement! Some of the mini-games aren't so mini, a few of them even resemble some other famous titles, for example a mini-game that largely resembles Bomberman!




Although the characters and story are a high priority during development, the quality of gameplay has already been well established! The engine is being created using my "Mega Man Perfect Harmony" fan game!



Footage from my separate 4-Player Mega Man Fan Game.

As mentioned before, the game combines the best elements from a broad range of genres to create a perfect mixture of entertainment. It plays almost as if it were a Mega Man game, with action, platforming, and quick reflexes being a big part of it.

However it also plays like a Final Fantasy game, with a very long story where a player can invest over 50 hours of gameplay! Characters can also progress in their abilities, and there are even towns and shops to purchase better equipment and speak with non-playable characters.

There are also elements and influences from Castlevania: Symphony of the Night. The player must navigate a vast world while collecting items and abilities in order to progress onward to other areas. Certain move inputs such as the "Hadoken" motion can also be used to perform special abilities, and there's also a very wide variety of weapons each with unique special abilities




Both of my games feature cooperative and versus modes. I plan on releasing several sequels for both games, but most of my time will be devoted to seeing The Dream King completed, so that I can turn my hobby into a full time job and continue doing what I do best!

The Versus Mode for both games plays a bit like Super Smash Bros, with a lot of the same menu options, play mechanics, and so forth such as items and enemies you can turn on and off! Test your skills against one another in 4-Player Time, Stock, or Frag Limit matches!

The game will also seem a little bit like Legends of the Mystical Ninja, in that it is a cooperative action RPG with a lot of mini-games within it! The Dream King will include a ton of really zany 4-Player mini-games that are accessible via dreams within The Enchanted Castle!







In the world of Endica, ancient prophecies tell of a hero who will bring peace to the world.

Tellus Thomas is an orphan who believes he can achieve the impossible! With help from his friends, he is absolutely determined to climb the tower in order to break the curse on the world and usher in an age of peace!

This is a story truly designed for people of any age, race, or gender in mind. The future king himself has the blood of every race within him, and the adventures he and his friends go on are sure to entertain kids, teenagers, and adults, male or female.





The tone and atmosphere is very dark, and yet the story and characters seem to always remain bright. It has strong messages of peace, love, and remaining positive, especially during  the darkest periods of your life.





The characters and story have received the most attention, they are created out of a love for art and storytelling. As a fan of classics, I believe the characters are the most important part of any story, and I strive to create ones that everyone can adore! Here is a brief summary of a few of the main characters:




Thomas

A poor orphan with the blood of every race
who carries the weight of the entire world.

Emily
A bold, powerful mage in search
of someone from her dreams.

Dash
A young adventurer with hope for
the future, his destiny is in your hands.

Cenedra
A close friend of Dash since
childhood, she was once a bandit.

Olivia
A lost girl raised by Fairies
searching for her true identity.

Valos
A modest Elven traveler who
is loyal to his companions.

Clive
Also known as The Lightbringer, the legendary swordsman
who is infamous for his immense strength and attitude.





Which Platforms will this game be available on?
Windows, Ubuntu, Mac OS X, iOS, Android, Ouya, and hopefully Steam and Gamestick. (The mobile platforms will be single player only.)

Will there be Single Player?
Yes, there will be a Single Player mode!

Will there be online co-op?
Unfortunately, no. All multiplayer game modes will be local only, as in all on one television set and system, not over a LAN.

Will there ever be any forms of online play?
It will be a feature in the sequels for this series!

Will there be a Player Versus Player Mode?
Yes!





https://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Dream-King/263377033709812
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Mega-Man-Perfect-Harmony/174530555890370

http://tig.wikia.com/wiki/The_Dream_King
http://rocksclan.com

https://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Dream-King/263377033709812https://www.facebook.com/pages/Mega-Man-Perfect-Harmony/174530555890370http://tig.wikia.com/wiki/The_Dream_Kinghttp://rocksclan.com

story:
El juego, Dudek.

Hemos inventado Dudek para vosotros:


"Busca el símbolo que se repite el número de veces indicado en el mazo, ¿serás el más rápido?".


¡Compacto y fácil de llevar!


¡60 cartas diferentes!



¡Educativo!


¡Entre amigos!



Ejemplo de carta:


¿Por qué Dudek?.

El juego se compone de 60 cartas, todas diferentes, con 20 símbolos en cada una de ellas. En el envés de cada carta irán apareciendo de manera aleatoria el número 2, 3, 4, 5, 6.   
Buscamos un nombre sencillo, que hiciera alusión a una característica que se repitiera en todas las cartas.
Dudek es la traducción en "Esperanto" de 20 (los 20 símbolos que aparecen en cada carta). 


Para qué es la financiación.

     Vuestra aportación hará posible que Dudek se edite, y pueda llegar hasta vosotros. Como financiadores del proyecto, disfrutaréis de un precio especial de lanzamiento, ¡a parte de nuestro infinito agradecimiento!.
     Tenemos los prototipos, el proceso de impresión y distribución organizado, sólo queda vuestro apoyo para conseguirlo.
     De no conseguirse el objetivo marcado, el dinero aportado os será devuelto en su totalidad.

Recompensas:

Dudek (1x). El juego completo.
Dudek (x2). "Pack duo"
Dudek (x3). "Pack trío"
Dudek (x4). "Pack familiar"
Dudek (x10). "Pack muchos amigos".
Gastos de envío incluídos en España. 
¡Las primeras unidades encargadas, adelantarán el plazo de entrega a abril.!

Comparte nuestro proyecto.

     No te olvides de compartir nuestro proyecto con la gente que creas que pueda interesarle. Tienes enlaces directos a tus redes favoritas, debajo del vídeo, al principio de esta historia.
Alguna consulta?  
Dudekcardgame@gmail.com
Otros proyectos de éxito?:
www.abejareina.net

Sobre el creador:


      Me llamo Jesús Sánchez, soy ingeniero y los que me conocen saben que mi mente siempre está navegando por el mundo de la invención.

     Este es el segundo juego que diseño, y mi premisa ha sido la de que sea sencillo, rápido de empezar a jugar, y para todas las edades. 

     Lo que me motiva es ver que a la gente le gusta, y por eso quiero usar crowdfunding para su lanzamiento, no se me ocurre un escenario mejor...

¡Apoya nuestro proyecto!.
¡Gracias!
